name: Concerto Para Piano e Pandemia May 5, 2021 at 3pm GMT +1
description: This is a virtual installation that collects tweets that contain the term covid and turns them into piano notes by using data sonification techniques.   You can own excerpts of this living experience that is streamed 24/7 on youtube. It is an ephemeral installation in which it is not possible to experience the past, only the present.  You can order a recording of any specific time in the future (such as a significant date). Just hit me up on twitter or e-mail and we can arrange it.
